channel.title: Flakes realm
channel.description:
hi the Moparscape community! i am Gods army and me and bowdeath4 (name on google) have started a server project called
[size=10pt]Flakes Realm[/size]
here is what we have
done for now started/almost done not started
skills
construction slayer farming hunter cooking (easy) fishing (easy) smithing (hard) (some other skills i cant remember, not on my laptop)
magic - 85% range - 95% thieving - 80% prayer - 90% attack - 90% strength - 90% defence - 90% crafting - 75% (gem cutting and jewelry making) runecrafting - 90% (only on 3 altars) (also needs to ruins when clicked to tele to altar) (some other skills i cant remember, not on my laptop)
firemaking bone burying herblore woodcutting mining (some other skills i cant remember, not on my laptop)
other stuff
mage arena ge (some other skills i cant remember, not on my laptop)
trade - 90% shops - 95% bh - 95% (just need bh tele and fix like 2 bugs) clan wars - 25 % < converting from espeon fight caves - 15% (not enough waves) < converting from espeon warrior guild - 15% (not tested just) < converting from espeon dueling - 15% (untested but should work) < converting from espeon
[COLOR=green]godwars :) ftw[/color]
pics:
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2wgyuzp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2vjc5ex.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/27yqzja.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/t5j50n.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/aep3pi.jpg[/img]
if i left any skill out plz tell me, also if you would like to make a suggestion to the server just post.
[size=10pt]credits:[/size]
[size=10pt]Bowdeath4 (google name) gods army[/size] xeloader (google name) pali (google name)
update log:
[code]november updates: DLed a source, fixed stuff added some skills etc
december updates: added thieving (untested) added bone burying (100% working) added crafting (gem cutting and jewelry making) added rcing (about 1-2 errors need to be fixed) added shops, working[/code]
[size=10pt]UPDATES TO COME:[/size]
[size=8pt]trading (i have the frames) dueling with staking mage arena minigame more skills more shops with 100% sell back release add a fullscreen option for members update to 523 etc (friend giving me source i think) make a 100% CW[/size]

item.title: Flakes realm
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

If you can make a type of Agility, cooking, fishing, and a minigame in one day then you’re going way too fast, and it will turn out really shitty.

Read full topic

item.title: Flakes realm
item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

i know tony i’ve made about 3 skills already and the bone burying was me… there was stuff that was on forums yes… but i did it to lol… but without pics its hard to believe… l8tr ill add pics… obtw i’ve added RCing and crafting by myself and im adding agility + cooking and maybe fishing today… maybe some minigame… (gonna try to code right after i get back from school)

this project started like 1 week ago btw

so ye…

Read full topic
